title: Israel Rejects the Promised Land
description:
Readings from:
Numbers 13:1-2, 26-28a, 30-31; 14:1-4
Today's passages were read by Pete Avery. Pete serves as a Team Leader with Cru in Fort Collins, Colorado, where he lives with his wife Michaela and five children.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
